Verses: 1 dhevane, En Vinnappaththil En Saththaththaik Kettarulum; Saththuruvaal Varum Bayaththai Neekki, En Piraananaik Kaaththarulum.
2 dhunmaarkkar Seyyum Ragasiya Aalosanaikkum, Akkiramakkaararudaiya Kalagaththukkum Ennai Vilakki Maraiththarulum.
4 maraivugalil Uththamanmel Eyyumporuttuk Kasappaana Vaarththaigalaagiya Thangal Ambugalai Naanetrugiraargal; Satrumbayamindrich Sadidhiyil Avanmel Eygiraargal.
5 avargal Pollaadha Kaariyaththil Thangalai Urudhippaduththikkondu, Maraivaana Kannigalai Vaikka Aalosanaipanni, Avaigalaik Kaanbavan Yaar Engiraargal.
6 avargal Niyaayakkedugalai Aaindhudhedi, Thandhiramaana Yosanai Niraiverumpadi Pirayaththanampannugiraargal; Avargalil Ovvoruvanudaiya Utkaruththum Irudhayamum Aazhamaayirukkiradhu.
7 aanaalum Dhevan Avargalmel Ambugalai Eyvaar, Sadidhiyaai Avargal Kaayappaduvaargal.
8 avargal Thallappattu, Keezhevizhumpadi Avargal Naavugale Avargalaik Kedukkum; Avargalaik Kaangira Yaavarum Odippovaargal.
9 ellaa Manusharum Bayandhu, Dhevanudaiya Seyalai Ariviththu, Avar Kiriyaiyai Unarndhukolvaargal.
10 needhimaan Karththarukkul Magizhndhu, Avarai Nambuvaan; Semmaiyaana Irudhayamullavargal Yaavarum Menmaipaaraattuvaargal.
